committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks
Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation, Forestry and Environment

official_title: A bill to designate various areas as components of National Wilderness Preservation System in the national forests in the State of Texas.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Texas Wilderness Act of 1984 - Designates the following lands in Texas as components of the National Wildernesss Preservation System: (1) the Turkey Hill Wilderness in the Angelina National Forest; (2) the Upland Island Wilderness in the Angelina National Forest; (3) the Big Slough Wilderness in the Davy Crockett National Forest; (4) the Indian Mounds Wilderness in the Sabine National Forest; and (5) the Little Lake Creek Wilderness in the Sam Houston National Forest. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire lands within the Indian Mounds and Upland Island Wilderness Areas owned by Temple-Eastex Incorporated by exchange. Requires the Secretary to terminate any existing timber sales contracts within the boundaries of the Indian Mounds, Upland Island, and Little Lake Creek Wilderness Areas without cost to the buyer. Provides that the RARE II (second roadless area review and evaluation) final environmental statement (dated January 1979) with respect to national forest system lands in Texas shall not be subject to judicial review. Releases national forest system lands in Texas which were reviewed in the RARE II program from further review by the Department of Agriculture, pending revision of initial forest management plans. Releases lands in Texas reviewed in the RARE II program and not designated as wilderness from management as wilderness areas. Prohibits the Department of Agriculture from conducting any further statewide roadless area review and evaluation of national forest system lands in Texas without express congressional authorization. Provides that the provisions of this paragraph shall also apply to national forest system roadless lands in Texas of less than 5000 acres in size.

titles.title: A bill to designate various areas as components of National Wilderness Preservation System in the national forests in the State of Texas.
